config.cookie_code: {"message":"Our cookie policy has changed. By continuing to browse this site you are agreeing to our use of cookies.","learnMore":"Review our cookies policy for more details and to change your cookie preference.","link":"http://www.economist.com/cookies-info"}

scripts.watch: nodemon -x "npm run build; npm start | bunyan" -i assets -i node_modules/ -e js,html,css
scripts.build: parallelshell "npm run build:assets" "npm run build:js" "npm run build:css" "npm run build:cookie" "npm run version"
scripts.build:js: echo {} > js-assets.json && parallelshell "npm run build:js:client" "npm run build:js:vendor" "npm run build:js:remotescripts" "npm run build:js:inline"
scripts.build:js:vendor: browserify -g envify -g uglifyify -r react -r react/lib/ReactUpdates | hashmark -l 8 -m js-assets.json -n 0vendor.js 'assets/{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:js:client: browserify `test "$NODE_ENV" != "production" && echo '-d'` -g envify -g uglifyify -x react -x react/lib/ReactUpdates client.js | hashmark -l 8 -m js-assets.json -n 5client.js 'assets/{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:css: echo {} > css-assets.json && parallelshell "npm run build:css:inline" "npm run build:css:client"
scripts.build:css:client: postcss -u cssnext -u cssnano -u postcss-nesting index.css | hashmark -l 8 -m css-assets.json -n style.css 'assets/{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:cookie: npm run build:cookie:css && npm run build:cookie:js && npm run build:cookie:js:inline
scripts.build:cookie:css: postcss -u cssnext -u cssnano -u postcss-nesting cookie-theme.css | hashmark -l 8 -m cookie-assets.json -n cookie 'assets/{hash}.css'
scripts.build:cookie:js:inline: CONTENTS=$(echo window.cookieconsent_options=$(echo $npm_package_config_cookie_code | json -0Ae "this.theme='/$(json -f cookie-assets.json cookie)'")) TYPE=js npm run push:inline
scripts.test: exit 0; # no tests yet! npm run test:base -- -R tap
